section.name: OpenMentor
section.p: This is the Maven web site for OpenMentor.

The development environment for Open Mentor has now been completed, by and large. It is based on Eclipse running under Java JDK 1.5.0. We are also using Maven and Subversion. For full details of how to install the development environment, see: the build environment page.
Throughout the development process, we will be running two separate versions of Open Mentor, available through the links below. Feel free to dip into these systems and try them out.

The development version is updated on a daily basis, and is likely to contain a fair number of bugs. However, it does reflect current development work, and issues will be signed off against this version of the system.

section.name: Source code
section.p: All the source code for OpenMentor is available at our Subversion repository, at: http://openmentor.comp.rgu.ac.uk/svn/openmentor/ This is accessible by anyone for reading. If you want to be able to write to this repository, contact the maintainers, Colin Beagrie <cb@comp.rgu.ac.uk> and Stuart Watt <S.N.K.Watt@rgu.ac.uk>
